question: What is the amount of total dues owed by Power Distribution firms to Power Producers till the month of August 2020?
explanation:
According to the PRAAPTI portal, the total dues owed by distribution firms to power producers stood at Rs.1.33 lakh crore in August 2020. It has registered a year on year increase of 37% from Rs.96,963 crore in August 2019.
PRAAPTI (Payment Ratification And Analysis in Power procurement for bringing Transparency in Invoicing of generators) is a portal launched in May 2018 by the Ministry of Power, in order to bring transparency in power purchase between power generator and distributor.
